item.title: Slowly building back
item.description: Few weeks have gone by without any update. Training As mentioned above, I did a 12 week based building structured as: Week # Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday Sunday Total 1 Rest 8 km Easy run Rest 8 km Easy run Rest 10 km Easy run 6 km Easy run 32 km 2 Rest 10 km Easy run Rest 8 km Easy run Rest 10 km Easy run 8 km Easy run 35 km 3 Rest 8 km Easy run 6 km Easy run 8 km Easy run Rest 10 km Easy run 8 km Easy run 40 km 4 Rest 8 km Easy run 6 km Easy run 8 km Easy run Rest 10 km Easy run + 4 x 100 m strides 8 km Easy run 40 km 5 Rest 8 km Easy run + 4 x 100 m strides 6 km Easy run 8 km Easy run + 4 x 100 m strides Rest 11 km Long run (Easy) 7 km Easy run + 4 x 100 m strides 40 km 6 Rest 10 km Easy run + 4 x 100 m strides 8 km Easy run 10 km Easy run + 4 x 100 m strides Rest 12 km Long run (Easy) 8 km Easy run + 4 x 100 m strides 48 km 7 Rest 8 km Easy run 11 km 3 km warm up + 4 x 100 m strides 20 min @ Tempo 3 km Cool down 8 km Recovery run Rest 13 km Long run Easy + Hilly route 8 km Recovery run 4 x 100 m Strides 48 km 8 Rest 8 km Easy run 11 km 3 km warm up Fartlek 10 x 1 min-fast, 1 min-easy 3 km Cool down 8 km Recovery run Rest 13 km Long run Progression 8 km Recovery run 4 x 100 m Strides 48 km 9 Rest 11 km Easy run 6 km Easy run + 4 x 100 m strides 11 km Easy run + 4 x 100 m strides 8 km Recovery run 14 km Long run Easy 6 km Recovery run 4 x 100 m Strides 56 km 10 Rest 8 km Easy run + 4 x 100 m strides 11 km 3 km warm up + 4 x 100 m strides 20 min @ Tempo 3 km Cool down 8 km Recovery run 8 km Easy run 15 km Long run Easy + Hilly route 6 km Recovery run + 4 x 100 m strides 56 km 11 Rest 8 km Easy run + 4 x 100 m strides 11 km 3 km warm up Fartlek 10 x 1 min-fast, 1 min-easy 3 km Cool down 8 km Recovery run 8 km Easy run 15 km Long run Progression 6 km Recovery run + 4 x 100 m strides 56 km 12 Rest 11 km Easy run + 4 x 100 m strides 10 km Recovery run 11 km Easy run + 4 x 100 m strides 8 km Recovery run 16 km Long run Easy 8 km Recovery run + 4 x 100 m strides 64 km Credit to the plan
